name: Stair Surfers
summary:
Simple and attractive game! Controlling character toward the pinnacle of the world non-stop climbing the ladder. Climbing and turning, the game only have two movements, seemingly simple, practical otherwise, is the test of the reaction . Within the duration of the game is more and more tightly. An inattentive act may fall, causing the game to fail. Get to climb higher and get more points!
Climbing process can collect gold coins, gold coins can be used to unlock new characters, scenes, cute pets. These roles and pets all equipped with special skills, and cute.
Players can receive a gift box within a certain time, do not get open quotas gold, gold can be extracted with a novel small roles and pet.
Unique and innovative gameplay, exciting challenge, absolutely give you unexpected hilarious experience.
